title: Mahotsav
tagline: A role-based MERN event management platform simplifying college fest registrations and coordination.
keyFeatures: Role-based access control for Admin, Lead/Coordinator, and User
JWT-based secure authentication and session handling
Admin dashboard for event creation and management
Coordinator panel for monitoring and managing participant registrations
User-friendly interface for quick event registration and profile editing
Real-time updates for registered participants and event changes
Deployed on Vercel for high scalability and fast performance

title: Student Magazine Portal
tagline: A departmental magazine portal for CSE students to submit, review, and publish articles, images, and event reports.
keyFeatures: Dual user roles: Student Coordinators can submit content, Admins review and publish
Submit articles, images, and event reports seamlessly
PDF generation of approved content into downloadable magazine editions
Automated approval workflow for faster content review
Responsive and intuitive user interface for smooth navigation
Track and manage submissions with status updates
Optimized content pipeline achieving 30% faster approval cycle

title: Email Spam Detection
tagline: A machine learning model to classify emails as spam or ham using advanced feature fusion techniques.
keyFeatures: Built a spam detection model using LightGBM with feature fusion (Count Vectorizer, TF-IDF, Word2Vec)
Applied text preprocessing: tokenization, stopword removal, and stemming
Evaluated model performance using precision, recall, F1-score, confusion matrix, and ROC curve
Achieved high classification accuracy of 98.6%
Visualized results with Matplotlib and Seaborn for insights
Optimized model performance with hyperparameter tuning and feature selection

title: Savour Spot
tagline: A basic web platform for users to register, log in, and access recipes, built to learn full MERN stack with JWT authentication.
keyFeatures: User registration and login with JWT-based authentication
Access recipes only after logging in
Basic CRUD operations for user accounts and recipes
Learned integration of React frontend with Node.js backend
Explored JSON for storing user and recipe data

title: Jewelry Website

keyFeatures: Interactive carousel to display jewelry items
DOM manipulation using JavaScript
Implemented promises for asynchronous tasks
Responsive layout with CSS for various screen sizes
Hands-on practice with frontend fundamentals (HTML, CSS, JS)
